passives.name: Fanfare
passives.effects: {{tip|Slow|Slowing}} or {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} an enemy champion empowers you with ''Fanfare'' for {{rd|8|4}} seconds, granting you {{as|20 '''bonus''' movement speed}}. While empowered, you and nearby allied champions also gain {{as|{{rd|30|20}}% '''bonus''' attack speed}}.
